context.p: A Program represents a collection of PDG Areas. Each Deployment artifact must have an associated Program.
NOTE: This is only available to users with permission.
Create a new Program within the PDU OSS Deployment Tracking Tool.
NOTE: JIRA Templates can be added to a Program after creation.

info.p: Click the Programs link in the navigation bar.
Click the Create new Program button.
Enter the details as shown below.
NOTE: Any restrictions on the fields are outlined.

ul.li: Name: Name of the Program. NOTE: If Program exists in Team Inventory Tool, dependent RAs and Teams will be automatically added.

info.p: Click the Save button, the Program will be created, and the user will be redirected back to the view page for the newly created Program.
NOTE: Program will not save if any fields are invalid (invalid fields are highlighted in red).

result.p: A New Program is created in the PDU OSS Deployment Tracking Tool.
